title: GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates - 22 Inch Cooking Surface
description: The GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates offers a classic grilling experience with the convenience of adjustable grates and precise temperature control. Featuring a 22-inch cooking surface, this grill is perfect for outdoor gatherings, cookouts, and camping trips. The heavy-duty steel construction with enamel coating ensures durability and resistance to the elements. The adjustable grates and built-in air vents allow for optimal heat control, while the easy-to-clean ashtray and sturdy cart with wheels make this grill both practical and mobile. Enjoy delicious grilled meals with family and friends with this versatile charcoal grill.
key_features: Heavy-duty steel construction with enamel coating
Built-in air vents and adjustable dampers for temperature control
Easy-to-clean ashtray and sturdy cart with wheels
Perfect for outdoor gatherings and camping trips
meta_title: GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates - 22 Inch Cooking Surface
meta_description: GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates - 22 inch cooking surface, heavy-duty construction, adjustable grates, and built-in air vents for outdoor cooking.

title: GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates - 18 Inch Cooking Surface
description: The GrillPro Charcoal Grill with Adjustable Grates offers exceptional performance for outdoor grilling. With an 18-inch cooking surface and adjustable grates, this grill is perfect for creating delicious meals for family gatherings or small parties. Constructed from heavy-duty steel with a durable enamel coating, this grill is designed for long-lasting use. The adjustable grates, air vents, and easy-to-clean ashtray provide convenience and control for achieving the perfect grilling temperature. The sturdy cart with wheels makes it easy to move and set up for your outdoor cooking needs.
key_features: Heavy-duty steel construction with enamel coating
Adjustable grates and air vents for precise temperature control
Easy-to-clean ashtray and sturdy cart with wheels
Ideal for family gatherings and small cookouts
